selected_quotes: Gender Diff in Sexual Risk STIs Correlate w Gender Diff in Social Networks → San Francisco Homeless Youth

citation.abstract: To explore whether gender differences in sexual risk and sexually transmitted infections (STIs) among homeless youth may be explained in part by gender differences in their social networks.
citation.title: Gender Differences in Sexual Risk and Sexually Transmitted Infections Correlate With Gender Differences in Social Networks Among San Francisco Homeless Youth
